mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(username, password, realname, nickname, email, address, phone, photo, role, state, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{photo}, "user", "active", now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username=#{username} AND password=#{password}
